verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Lord, Your tenderness
Melting all my bitterness,
O Lord, I receive Your love.
O Lord, Your loveliness,
Changing all my ugliness,
O Lord, I receive Your love.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O Lord, I receive Your love!
O Lord, I receive Your love!
O Lord, I receive Your love!
O Lord, I receive Your love!
